name: Hang In There (SemvdH)
description:
Hang In There!

This is a small physics game completely written in java from scratch, using Java2D and the Dyn4j physics library.

The objective of the game is to survive as long as possible by dodging obstacles that fly at you.  Every obstacle is completely randomly generated for endless runs! Every time you get 10 points in one run, the difficulty is increased. How far can you go?

How to play:

Click anywhere on the screen with the left mouse button to spawn a black hole, which will suck you towards it, enabling you to dodge any incoming danger!

Planned updates:

- Character select screen

- More game art

- Detachable limbs as you hit objects

- UI improvements

- Sound effects and music
